pkgmetadata.longdescription: medspacy-io------------medspacy-io is a collection of modules to facilitate reading text from various sources and writing to various sources.Installation------------ pip install medspacy-ioHow to use------------Please refer to the samples in the tests.A Colab notebook demo is available at:https://colab.research.google.com/drive/12EBOaKej9uPmGAb5dV2oB1goEWrwXjSD
